playn.core.gl
Class GL20Program

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.gl.GL20Program
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLProgram
public class GL20Program
extends Object
implements GLProgram

A shader program implementation built on the GL20 API.

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: GLProgram
Frees this program and associated compiled shaders. The program must not be used after destruction.

Specified by:
destroy in interface GLProgram
